resources.string: "4G service is not available with this selected SIM. This may load data slower. You can change the 4G service setting under Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks. Are you sure to select this SIM?"
"4G service is not available with this selected SIM. This may load data slower. You can change the 4G service setting under Settings > SIM management. Are you sure to select this SIM?"
"You must enable data roaming for this SIM first which may incur significant roaming charges! Are you sure to enable data roaming and select this SIM?"

"4G service is not available with this selected SIM. This may load data slower. You can change the 4G service setting under Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks. Are you sure to select this SIM?"

"You must enable data roaming for this SIM first which may incur significant roaming charges! Besides, 4G service is not available with this SIM. This may load data slower. You can change it under Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks. Are you sure to enable data roaming and select this SIM?"

"You must enable data roaming for this SIM first which may incur significant roaming charges! Besides, 4G service is not available with this SIM. This may load data slower. You can change it under Settings > SIM management. Are you sure to enable data roaming and select this SIM?"
